name: MacularEdemaFindingsPresent
title: Macular Edema Findings Present
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent the presence of macular edema.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Communication, or Diagnosis, or as an attribute to represent exam findings.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with the presence of macular edema.),(Exclusion Criteria: Concepts that do not indicate macular edema are excluded from this value set.)
